name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.image.transfer.chunksize
description:
Chunksize in bytes to upload the checkpoint.
        Chunked streaming is used to avoid internal buffering of contents
        of image file of huge size.
        Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
        in dfs.blocksize.

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.hard-kill-timeout-ms
description: Number of milliseconds to wait before the job client kills the application.

name: dfs.datanode.lazywriter.interval.sec
description: Interval in seconds for Datanodes for lazy persist writes.

name: dfs.qjournal.write-txns.timeout.ms
description:
Write timeout in milliseconds when writing to a quorum of remote
    journals.

name: dfs.namenode.edekcacheloader.interval.ms
description:
When KeyProvider is configured, the interval time of warming
    up edek cache on NN starts up / becomes active. All edeks will be loaded
    from KMS into provider cache. The edek cache loader will try to warm up the
    cache until succeed or NN leaves active state.
